name: Adelantado Trilogy. Book Two
description: Get ready for new adventures and unexpected twists! The atmosphere is moody and grim but Don Diego tries to keep everybody cheerful. And ever-present rival Commander Rodriguez is more evil than ever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: Pentium III 800MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Game can function not properly on Windows 10
